The most convenient way to store, manage, optimize and distribute inventory in Saudi Arabia

Sirdab is a technology focused startup offering on-demand warehousing and logistics solutions along with the platform which enables you to manage your supply chain

Why Sirdab?

Tech Enablement, Ops Excellence and Competitive Pricing

Low monthly rate

Due to our technology-driven processes, we are able to offer you the most competitive price in the market

Hassle-free process

We will take care of the whole process from A to Z

Cloud inventory platform

We offer software to easily manage your inventory, operations and billing all in one place

How It Works

Straightforward steps to get your space and optimize your supply chain

Request

Request Service

Get in touch with one of our experts to review your needs and learn how we can help

Pick up

We will arrange pickups and supplier drop-offs of your items

Our team will handle all of your logistics needs from and to our warehouses

Store

We'll store it safely

Our team will assist in selecting the most ideal locations for storing your inventory whether it is dry, ambient, chilled or frozen

Manage & Analyze

Manage and analyze your inventory through Sirdab portal

Through our portal, you will be able to view inventory levels and weekly consumption by SKU, inbounds and outbounds activities

Distribute

Distribute your inventory with a click of a button

Distribute your inventory to branches, request LTL freight and manage deliveries to consumers, all through one platform
